text: Shatskyi Lakes means "Lakes of Shatsk" in Ukrainian. It is a group of fresh water lakes located in northern Ukraine near the borders with Belarus and Poland, in the basin of the Bug river, and are known for their clean, pure waters. The biggest lake and the most famous is Svitiaz. ==See also== * Shatsk National Natural Park ==References== ==External links== * UNESCO Biosphere Reserves Directory * Category:Ramsar sites in Ukraine
title: Shatskyi Lakes
